item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "If you make a mistake and do not correct it, this is called a mistake." -- Confucius

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "For myself I am an optimist - it does not seem to be much use to be anything else." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "But life is a battle: may we all be enabled to fight it well!" -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Paula White
item.description: "Champions have the courage to keep turning the pages because they know a better chapter lies ahead." -- Paula White

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "There are two kinds of teachers: the kind that fill you with so much quail shot that you can't move, and the kind that just gives you a little prod behind and you jump to the skies." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Dale Carnegie
item.description: "It isn't what you have or who you are or where you are or what you are doing that makes you happy or unhappy. It is what you think about it." -- Dale Carnegie

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Max Ehrmann
item.description: "Avoid loud and aggressive persons, they are vexations to the spirit." -- Max Ehrmann

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by John Wooden
item.description: "Be more concerned with your character than your reputation, because your character is what you really are, while your reputation is merely what others think you are." -- John Wooden

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Ambrose Redmoon
item.description: "Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgement that something else is more important than fear." -- Ambrose Redmoon

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Dan Zadra
item.description: "No one can go back and make a brand new start, my friend, but anyone can start from here and make a brand new end." -- Dan Zadra

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Barbara Johnson
item.description: "To be in your children's memories tomorrow, You have to be in their lives today." -- Barbara Johnson

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Vince Lombardi
item.description: "once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit" -- Vince Lombardi

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by St. Francis Of Assisi
item.description: "Start by doing what is necessary, then what is possible, and suddenly you are doing the impossible." -- St. Francis Of Assisi

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Rick Warren
item.description: "We are products of our past, but we don't have to be prisoners of it." -- Rick Warren

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Gaddy Bergmann
item.description: "Someday is now." -- Gaddy Bergmann

item.title: Jilardi add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "It's kind of fun to do the impossible." -- Walt Disney
